title: TypedTransaction can't be decoded into `types.Transaction` unlike LegacyTransaction
body:
#### System information

Go version: 1.18
`go-ethereum` version: 1.10.19
OS & Version: Linux, Ubuntu 20

#### Expected behaviour

I expected to be able to decode a raw (1559) tx in the same way I'm able to decode a legacy tx.

#### Actual behaviour

Legacy decoding works:
```
(*types.Transaction)(0xc00012e240)({
 inner: (*types.LegacyTx)(0xc00012e2a0)({
  Nonce: (uint64) 690,
  GasPrice: (*big.Int)(0xc00013b360)(2000000000),
  Gas: (uint64) 21000,
  ...
```

Typed transaction fails:
```
2022/06/25 07:20:13 typed transaction too short
exit status 1
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

```
package main

import (
    "encoding/hex"
    "log"

    "github.com/davecgh/go-spew/spew"
    "github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/core/types"
    "github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/rlp"
)

func main() {

    // eip-1559 tx: 0xc2163f50770bd4bfd3c13848b405a56a451ae2a39cfa5a236ea2738ce44aa9df
    //rawTx := "02f8740181bf8459682f00851191460ee38252089497e542ec6b81dea28f212775ce8ac436ab77a7df880de0b6b3a764000080c080a02bc11202cee115fe22558ce2edb25c621266ce75f75e9b10da9a2ae72460ad4ea07d573eef31fdebf0f5f93eb7721924a082907419eb97a8dda0dd20a4a5b954a1"

    // legacy tx
    rawTx := "f86d8202b28477359400825208944592d8f8d7b001e72cb26a73e4fa1806a51ac79d880de0b6b3a7640000802ca05924bde7ef10aa88db9c66dd4f5fb16b46dff2319b9968be983118b57bb50562a001b24b31010004f13d9a26b320845257a6cfc2bf819a3d55e3fc86263c5f0772"

    var tx *types.Transaction

    rawTxBytes, err := hex.DecodeString(rawTx)
    if err != nil {
        log.Fatal(err)
    }

    err = rlp.DecodeBytes(rawTxBytes, &tx)
    if err != nil {
        log.Fatal(err)
    }

    spew.Dump(tx)
}
```
